text: Chlorate is an ion. Its chemical formula is . It contains chlorine in the +5 oxidation state. It is a strong oxidizing agent. It exists in chemical compounds such as potassium chlorate. Many chlorates produce oxygen when they are heated. Chlorates are salts of chloric acid. ==Related pages== *Hypochlorite *Potassium chlorate Category:Chlorine compounds Category:Oxyanions
title: Chlorate
